name: Mini Bag Sealer, USB-C rechargeable Bag Sealer, 2 in 1 Bag Sealer Heat Seal with Cutter and Magnet, Mini Bag Resealer Machine for Plastic Bags Snack Bags. Authorized Seller: Luke X
about_this_item: 【Our Core Advantage】This mini bag sealer is the only one on the market that charges via USB-C port. This unique feature eliminates the hassle of searching for cords, as opposed to other similar products that use Micro-USB or batteries. With the USB-C interface, all your devices can share the same charging cable, making charging much more convenient.

【2-in-1 Sealer and Cutter】This sealer is an indispensable kitchen accessory, capable of cutting and resealing plastic bags and food storage pouches, providing a more efficient solution than bag clips. It is compact and easy to carry, making it convenient for use on-the-go.

【Seal Various Bags】The heat sealer is suitable for various types of bags. It can quickly reseal food storage bags, chip bags, fruit bags, and candy bags in seconds, keeping them airtight. Please NOTE that SUPER THIN PLASTICS, such as cling film, are NOT SUITABLE as they will melt directly.

【Instant Heating】Much better than bag sealers powered by AA batteries, this lithium battery-powered sealer features a powerful and efficient heating element unit that can rapidly heat up within 1 second and seal the bags immediately upon reaching operating temperature, saving time effectively.
【Keep Food Fresh】Resealing food bags helps to keep vegetables, fruits, and grains fresher for longer periods. Reducing food waste is environmentally beneficial and can help save on grocery costs.
【Compact and Portable】The high-quality mini 2-in-1 sealer and cutter are perfect for carrying on-the-go, handheld, and portable, making it ideal for travel, camping, and hiking trips.

title: Verified Purchase
content: This is a point sealer rather than a line sealer.  Therefore to seal the line across the top of your bag, so that the bag is sealed, you have to drag the tool across a line from one side to the other, and there should be no gaps in that line.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on March 3, 2024

title: It works, but it takes some effort
content: This is not too hard if you have a single thickness bag (so total of 2 thicknesses in the sealer, to be sealed together.  If you miss an area, you have to go back and retrace through it.  As the instructions say, make sure the new line intersects the old ones.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2024

title: Better than competitors
content: I had difficulty because my bag has accordion folds on the sides.  It's a bag that's designed to be heat sealed.  You open it, pour in the contents, and seal across the top.  Then there's a ziplock on the side that you can open to get at the contents, and seal that back every time you open it.  To open wide to accept the initial filling, it has accordion folds on the sides.  Unfortunately, this puts four thicknesses rather than two in the heater, and I had to go very slowly, and it seems like maybe I sealed it, or at least nearly sealed it so that if I fold the bag over, it will leak air very slowly.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2024

title: Efficient Cutter, Mixed Sealing Performance
content: I've never tried the sealer that does a whole line at once, but I am imagining that that type can seal these bags more easily.  But they take more space, they're not battery powered, and they don't attach magnetically to your refrigerator door.  This heat sealer also has a cutter, in case you want to seal, then cut off the seal.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2024

title: It seals and cuts
content: The instructions are almost microscopic.  Bring good eyesight or a magnifying glass.  But it's pretty self explanatory, and I just told you most of what it says.
